| History                 = The Bonedog Posse are a drug gang based in the Bedford–Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn. They are a gang that sells crack and meth to kids. It sent representatives to a gangland auction in Chinatown, whom were killed by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Punisher Vol 6 34}}
